column4: Hi all, I have been using Ubuntu 8.10 and vlc to watch mp4 movies with no problem, but lately I have been having problem, vlc seems to show only blue screen and sound but nothing else, same case with totem player, the mp4 file seems to play ok on xp.
totem asked me to install the codecs (2 choices) and I installed both.
do you have compiz (desktop effects) enabled?
you may need to change the video output in your movie player if you are using effects
